Although this game has aged terribly, I would say it is still a fun game to play if you are interested in "classic" shooter games. I rate this a 10/10; would not play again. Now off to Half-Life 2!

Half-Life is a game that half of my life revolves around. From the day I aged enough to only have half of my life left, I made the $10 purchase. You play as Gordon Freeman, who is the result of a horrible science experiment gone wrong that combined Gordon Ramsey and Morgan Freeman. This combination proved to be useless as he lost both the cooking ability of Ramsey and the voice of Morgan. Freeman became so angry, he swore to end the lives of the scientists who did this horrible thing to him. As Gordon Freeman, you must manipulate and ultimately kill all of the employees of Black Mesa who brought this suffering upon you. Also HD Textures are stupid.

Raging MIT graduate slaughters an entire battalion of troops and extraterrestrials, government concerned.

more at 12
An amazing classic everyone should play
Â¿Que se puede decir? Un clÃ¡sico.

En su tiempo y contexto fue una total y absoluta revoluciÃ³n para el gÃ©nero. Hoy en dÃ­a a mi parecer no puedo decir que haya envejecido mal. La IA de Half Life creo que es una de las mejores que he visto jamÃ¡s y sÃ³lo puedes ser consciente de su empeÃ±o y esmero si ves estudios en Youtube sobre el comportamiento de cada uno de los enemigos, lamentablemente no hay nada en el juego que te invite a hacer este descubrimiento por tu parte. Hay temas molestos, en cuanto a narrativa y de accesibilidad pero en general puedes ver los cimientos y la base sÃ³lida de un juego Single Player. Historia de los videojuegos.
Aged perfectly and still more than playable. Would recommend to any fan of FPS, not just old school fans

What can I tell about Half-Life what hasn't been told? It's the best and most influential FPS of all time. It might be older than you, it might look terrible, but don't let those little discourage you from playing this masterpiece.

Half-Life is an excellent game despite its age. I've just gotten it and have been playing it in 2020, and it's still fun.
Titolo storico e dalla grande importanza.

after some hours of dying, searching for walkthroughs, and messing around to discover what to do, i've finally completed the game, really fun and a little hard, took me 25 hours to complete, but it was worth every damn second
Amazing game i love it. Play with HD models turned off tho to get the half life experiece
Classic 1st person shooter... you have to think outside of the box to finish this one

Overall a bit confusing at times especially for today's standards, but still holds up really well. I love Black Mesa as a setting, both the gameplay and the levels vary a lot, it is quite hard to put it down to be honest. However... oh my goodness, the jumping sections and the whole Xen level are just pain in the ass. And even on medium difficulty it can be so hard thanks to damage you suffer that I got frustrated a lot more than I wanted to. But if you've never played it definetly give it a try, a true classic.
So many good memories playing this

Half Life withstands the test of time and is totally still worth playing. I am amazed at how the graphics hold up. The tense moods and adventurous levels never fail to keep you on the edge of your seat. The alien weaponry is as fun as it ever was. 

Can't wait to play Blue Shift and Opposing Force next! 

* I will be very sad if there is not a fix eventually to make Half Life 64 bit compatible (or whatever the issue is that is keeping me from running it on my newer Macbook). Last time I checked I can only run it on my older iMac.
por fin puedo disfrutar el juego original ya que lo tenia pirata descargado de google, siempre quise comprarmelo porque lo juego desde mi infancia y nunca me cansare de jugarlo esta super....
Es un juegazo, su historia es unica el que lo odia de seguro debe seguir jugando al cs 1.6 pirata no sabiendo que por "la basura esa" lo comezo todo, un juego y se lo recomiendo mucho.
The best first person shooter of all time.
A masterpiece, it's so good that it's better than Half-Life 2. (in my opinion) So buy it now. Buy it! Do it! Do it now!
you gay if you dont have it
The game is supperb, even today the gameplay is excellent. I had played it when it was released and I am playing it again after more than 20 years.
this game is great. its crowbar time boys

awesome game i played it about ten years ago and now play it competitively whether i'm speedrunning it or playing Adrenaline Gamers either bhopping or gaussing around at the speed of sound on crossfire with other speedrunners there is so much you can do with this game just get it it only costs like 1 dollar when its on sale

It's old but it's still best game and the start of half-life timeline. If you don't really like playing alone you can join some servers in half-life deathmatch.
Something about settings:
[list]
    [*]If you don't like classic models and textures of some characters you can change them to HD graphics. 
    [*]You can't change language inside of game but you can do it by clicking on game in library with right mouse button and by going to properties>language. 
[/list]
